name: Spire of Sorcery – Character Generator / 角色生成器
developer: Charlie Oscar Lima Tango Interactive Entertainment
description: Spire of Sorcery is the upcoming open world survival RPG from Alexey Bokulev (creator of Eador. Genesis and Gremlins, Inc.). This free companion tool for the game allows you to generate and edit characters (biographies, portraits) from the world of Rund, and share them with the community.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel 2.3Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Internal
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5 / similar AMD or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Internal
